languages.text: "Как мило они пытаются изобразить, что не готовы порвать друг друга при первой возможности".
"They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."
languages.original_text: "Как мило они пытаются изобразить, что не готовы порвать друг друга при первой возможности".

traits.locale_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “他们脸上挂着如此甜蜜的伪装。只要一有机会，他们就会扑向对方，把对方撕成碎片。”
languages.original_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: “他们脸上挂着如此甜蜜的伪装。只要一有机会，他们就会扑向对方，把对方撕成碎片。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「ずいぶん仲良しごっこがうまいな。チャンスがあれば、互いに喉笛を食いちぎるだろうに」
languages.original_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: 「ずいぶん仲良しごっこがうまいな。チャンスがあれば、互いに喉笛を食いちぎるだろうに」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Hacen como que no... pero se despellejarían vivos a la primera de cambio».
languages.original_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: «Hacen como que no... pero se despellejarían vivos a la primera de cambio».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « C'est charmant, cette façon qu'ils ont de cacher qu'ils se sauteraient à la gorge à la première occasion. »
languages.original_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: « C'est charmant, cette façon qu'ils ont de cacher qu'ils se sauteraient à la gorge à la première occasion. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Eine allerliebste Heuchelei – sie würden einander bei erstbester Gelegenheit in Stücke reißen."
languages.original_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Eine allerliebste Heuchelei – sie würden einander bei erstbester Gelegenheit in Stücke reißen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Aralarında tatlı bir çekişme var. İlk fırsatta birbirlerini paramparça etmeye hazırlar."
languages.original_text: "They dissemble so sweetly — they would tear each other apart at the first opportunity."

traits.locale_text: "Aralarında tatlı bir çekişme var ama ilk fırsatta birbirlerini paramparça ederler."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
